testsuite.name: adminWorkshopValidation.WorkshopDashboardValidation

testcase.name: verifyRegTktData
testcase.system-out: Ticket Sales Amount (from Dashboard): ₹20000.0 Total of Attendee Prices: ₹20000.0 ✔ Ticket Sales amount matches total attendee prices

testcase.name: verifyAttendeeCount
testcase.system-out: Dashboard Attendee Count: 2 Actual Attendee Count on Page: 2 ✔ Attendee count matches between Dashboard and Detail Page

testcase.name: verifyRegistrationBreakdownWithAttendeeData
testcase.system-out: Dashboard Paid Count: 2 Dashboard Refunded Count: 0 Dashboard Canceled Count: 0 Paid Attendee Count: 2 Refunded Attendee Count: 0 Canceled Attendee Count: 0 ✔ Registration breakdown data matches attendee statuses.

testcase.name: sessionCountValidation

failure.message: Session Count count mismatch! expected [0] but found [6]

testcase.name: verifySpeakerCount
testcase.system-out: Speaker Count: Dashboard = 1, Page = 1 ✔ Speaker Count count matches between Dashboard and Detail Page

testcase.name: verifySponsorCount

testsuite.system-out: Admin login successful Ticket Sales Amount (from Dashboard): ₹20000.0 Total of Attendee Prices: ₹20000.0 ✔ Ticket Sales amount matches total attendee prices Dashboard Attendee Count: 2 Actual Attendee Count on Page: 2 ✔ Attendee count matches between Dashboard and Detail Page Dashboard Paid Count: 2 Dashboard Refunded Count: 0 Dashboard Canceled Count: 0 Paid Attendee Count: 2 Refunded Attendee Count: 0 Canceled Attendee Count: 0 ✔ Registration breakdown data matches attendee statuses.
